list.name: ingest_status
list.query: SELECT status FROM ingest WHERE id = '${INGEST_ID}'
list.label: Ingest Status

list.name: lint_status
list.query: SELECT status FROM lint WHERE id = '${LINT_ID}'
list.label: Lint Status

list.name: policy_status
list.query: SELECT status FROM policy WHERE id = '${POLICY_ID}'
list.label: Policy Status

list.name: verification_status
list.query: SELECT status FROM verification WHERE id = '${VERIFICATION_ID}'
list.label: Verification Status

list.name: placement_status
list.query: SELECT status FROM placement WHERE id = '${PLACEMENT_ID}'
list.label: Placement Status

list.name: revshare_status
list.query: SELECT status FROM revshare WHERE id = '${REVSHARE_ID}'
list.label: Revshare Status
